title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 102.6 - Reimbursement for intracounty travel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 102.6 - Reimbursement for intracounty travel

State Regulations

Traveling expenses incurred by a judge or
justice to whom subdivision (a) of section
102.0
of this Part applies, during
the performance of judicial duties within the county in which he or she is
provided chambers, will be reimbursed if such travel occurred in accordance
with a plan submitted, by an administrative judge on behalf of one or more
judges or justices, to the Chief Administrator of the Courts, and approved by
the Chief Administrator. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
102.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
